DignusData as a leading Worldwide hosting provider ​


DignusData founded in 2017, is a well-known IT company which offering Web development and consulting services for small business in Macedonia. The reason that customers from the USA, Germany, China, Spain and many more countries have chosen DignusData is that we are taking care of any client from Worldwide. We have experience with a highly trained and enthusiastic IT workforce, which will always meet the requirements and demands for your business, doesn't matter where you are: in Skopje or in China or even somewhere in World. We will take care of your business with Higher Levels of European standards.
Please check our Intro video for more details
